ygData.subject: RE: What now / inspire me
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I did the same (still play my Bard though) and started a cleric (up to 7), wizard (up to 7) and a Shaman (up to 11 so far). Right now I find myself mostly
ygData.messageBody:
> I basically dealt with it by mothballing my L49 bard and
> starting a druid on the new server.

I did the same (still play my Bard though) and started a
cleric (up to 7), wizard (up to 7) and a Shaman (up to 11
so far). Right now I find myself mostly playing the Shaman
because being an Ogre is so much fun. Not to mention I'm
*really* looking forward to levitate at 14 instead of
waiting for 31 (?) for my Bard to get it. Flying Ogres!

I love my bard quite a bit, but I'm dreading the higher levels
when I have to give extensive thought as to which songs to play
in which situation. It just seems like a lot of work instead
of fun. *shrug* Maybe it's not and I'll find out. But I don't
forsee myself ever hitting 50. I'd much rather have 8
different characters of different classes to see what they're
all like.
